elements.MAIN_EFFECT: [][][Scout] {3}.  {J} You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: You may discard target Character with Hand Cost {4} or more.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next Spell you play this turn loses [[Fleeting]].

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: [][][Scout] {3}.  {H} You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: You may discard target Character with Hand Cost {4} or more.
[][][Scout] {4}.  {H} You may discard a Spell from your Reserve. If you do: You may discard target Character, otherwise send it to Reserve.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []You may [Augment] target card in play or in Reserve.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: [][][Scout] {3}.  {H} []You may discard target Character or Permanent with Hand Cost {2} or less.  {R} If you control one or more Landmarks: Create a [Mana Moth 2/2/2] Illusion token in your Companion Expedition.
[][][Scout] {3}.  {J} []You may send to Reserve target Character with Hand Cost {3} or less.
[][][Scout] {3}.  {H} []You may send to Reserve target Character with Hand Cost {3} or less.
[][][Scout] {3}.  {J} If your Hero Expedition is behind: You may discard target Character or Permanent with Hand Cost {2} or less.  When you play a Spell — If I'm not [[Fleeting]]: I gain 1 boost.

[][][Scout] {3}.  {H} You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: You may discard target Character with Hand Cost {4} or more.  At Dusk — You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If it's a Spell: Target opponent discards a card from their hand.
[][][Scout] {4}.  {H} []You may discard target Character in play or in Reserve.  {R} You may sacrifice a Character. If you do: You may send to Reserve target Character with Hand Cost {2} or less.
[][][Scout] {3}.  {J} []You may discard target Character with Hand Cost {5} or less. If you do, create a [Mana Moth 2/2/2] Illusion token in its Expedition.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next Spell you play this turn loses [[Fleeting]].

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: [][][Scout] {3}.  {J} []You may send to Reserve target Character with Hand Cost {4} or more.  When you create a token — If I have 1 or more boosts: Target Character in play or in Reserve other than me gains 1 boost.
[][][Scout] {3}.  {J} You may sacrifice a Character. If you do: You may discard target Character with Hand Cost {4} or more.
[][][Scout] {3}.  {J} You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: You may discard target Character with Hand Cost {3} or less.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []You may exhaust target card in Reserve.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: [][][Scout] {3}.  {J} You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: You may discard target Character with Hand Cost {4} or more.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next Spell you play this turn loses [[Fleeting]].

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: [][][Scout] {3}.  {H} If you control one or more Landmarks: You may send to Reserve target Character with Hand Cost {4} or more.  When you play a Spell — If your Hero Expedition is behind: Target Character in play or in Reserve gains 1 boost.

[][][Scout] {3}.  {H} If you control one or more Landmarks: You may discard target Character with Hand Cost {3} or less.  When you create a token — If your Hero Expedition is behind: Target Character other than me gains 1 boost.
[][][Scout] {3}.  {H} []You may discard target Character with Hand Cost {5} or less. If you do, create a [Mana Moth 2/2/2] Illusion token in its Expedition.
[][][Scout] {4}.  {H} If your Hero Expedition is behind: You may discard target Character.  At Dusk — If my Expedition is behind: You may discard target Permanent.
[][][Scout] {4}.  {H} If both of your Expeditions are behind or tied: You may send target Character to Reserve.  At Dusk — If I have 1 or more boosts: You may discard target Permanent.
